document_data.caption: A tangler beetle walks alongside a [[fire beetle]] and a rot scarab swarm.
document_data.name: Tangler Beetle
document_data.mainbody: '''Tangler beetles''' were a species of [[beetle|giant beetle]] notable for their adhesive saliva.
document_data.Description: The chitinous bodies of these beetles had a black coloration.
document_data.Abilities: The most notable trait of these beetles was their sticky saliva, which was so adhesive it could hold fast a [[giant]]. However, a few minutes after exposure to air this saliva began to dry and lose its stickiness.
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], the [[Chang Emporium]] shipped tangler beetles alongside [[bombardier beetle|bombardier]] and [[fire beetle]]s on the [[caravel]] [[Dragonfly (caravel)|''Dragonfly'']] to the city of [[New Velar]], intending to have them sold by [[Lin-Woh]] as guardian animals. However, once there an offloading accident occured, leading cages to crash to the ground and unleash many of the beetles trapped within them.<ref>{{Cite organized play/LFR/The Prospect|5-6}}
